{{book |title=Tolkien Centenary Conference 1992 | image = Tolkien Centenary Conference 1992.jpg |editor=Edited and designed by [[Wayne G. Hammond]] |publisher=[Printed by:] Williamstown, Massachusetts: McClelland Press
[Published by:] The [[Mythopoeic Society]] and [[the Tolkien Society]] |date=[[1992]] |format=Booklet |pages=49 |noisbn=N/A }} '''''Tolkien Centenary Conference 1992''''' is a souvenir book which was published in conjunction to the [[J.R.R. Tolkien Centenary Conference]]. It was limited to five hundred fifty copies. The booklet features cover and title page art by [[Patrick H. Wynne]], leaf ornament drawn by [[Tony Curtis]], and [[:File:Kay Woollard - Party Piece (full).jpg|centrefold art]] by [[Kay Woollard]]. ==Contents== *"Chairman's Welcome", by [[Christina Scull]] *Acknowledgements *Chronology of J.R.R. Tolkien *Recollections **[Untitled], by Canon [[Norman Power]] **[Untitled], by H.M. Queen [[Margrethe II of Denmark|Margrethe II]]; from an interview conducted by Thorkild Hansen in 1979 **[Untitled?], by [[Árpád Göncz]]; statement of appreciation of Tolkien, written for the Centenary Conference *"The Tolkien Society", by [[Charles E. Noad]] *"The Mythopoeic Society", by [[Glen H. Goodknight]] *"Tolkien Fandom", by [[Sumner Gary Hunnewell]] *Papers, Talks, and Panels *The Committee *Sponsors ==See also== *''[[Proceedings of the J.R.R. Tolkien Centenary Conference]]'' {{title|italics}} [[Category:Books by Wayne G. Hammond]] [[Category:Publications by title]] [[Category:Scholarly books]] [[Category:Souvenir books]]
